author: m. mc sweeney
title: m. mc sweeney
text: mechanic arrived within the agreed time slot. As he considered my location on the road was potentially unsafe we went to a nearby car park for the work to be carried out.The work was carried efficentley even when he encountered a spare wheel where the tyre had never been removed since the car was manufactured
